articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Construction Sites of Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Construction Sites of Huichon Power Station
						
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the construction sites of the Huichon Power Station and encouraged the builders who launched a new year campaign.
					 The first leg of his field guidance was the construction site of the Ryongrim Dam of Huichon Power Station No. 1.
					
					 Going round the construction sites where temperature went up and down 30 degrees below zero, he acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in the projects and expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the builders have done a lot of work in a matter of several months and are bringing about miracles and innovations day by day from the outset of the year in hearty response to the Party's call for glorifying this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the WPK as a year of historic change to be recorded in the annals of the country, in particular.
					
					 Seeing the soldier-builders performing  feats despite the biting cold in the northern area to deeply move every visitor, he said that great, indeed, is the mental power of the army wholeheartedly responding to the Party's call and highly appreciated their revolutionary spirit.
					
					 After hearing about their firm pledge to finish the construction of the Ryongrim Dam ahead of schedule, he was confident that the giant dam of Huichon Power Station No. 1 would tower and a large man-made lake appear before long thanks to the heroic struggle of the soldier-builders. He earnestly called on the builders to bring earlier the day of victory without fail by their concerted efforts.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the construction site of the dam of Huichon Power Station No. 2.
					
					 After being briefed on the construction before a large map showing the panoramic view of the power station, he went round the construction site of the dam reminiscent of a battle site to learn about the progress made in the projects. 
					
					 Watching the dam making its majestic appearance, he was greatly pleased with the miracle unprecedented in the history of the dam construction the soldier-builders have worked through a dynamic charge with a patriotic desire to build a thriving nation at an early date. He highly appreciated their feats. 
					
					 The devoted drive of the builders of the power station including the soldier-builders, the creators of the "Huichon Speed", a new Chollima speed, has opened a bright prospect of completing the vast construction of the large-scale power station in a matter of a few years, the projects which would take more than ten years at an ordinary pace, he noted, extending his heartfelt gratitude to all the builders of the Huichon Power Station for creating the speed of new advance, the speed of Songun Korea, by giving full play to the revolutionary soldier spirit, the revolutionary spirit of fortitude. He offered his special thanks to them.
					
					 He set forth highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for completing the construction of the Huichon Power Station earlier than scheduled.
					
					 It is a very difficult and Herculean task to finish the vast projects in a matter of 2-3 years but it is quite possible to do so as long as there are the inexhaustible strength of the army and the people and the foundation of the powerful self-supporting industry, he said, stressing the need for the whole Party and army and all the people to turn out in a great offensive to wind up the construction of the power station before 2012.
					
					 He underlined the need to pay special attention to the builders' living including lodging and boarding so that they might not feel even the slightest inconvenience.
					
					 Today when a new bright morning of prosperity is breaking on the land of the country, our army and people are highly proud of being victors and replete with the militant stamina and the determination to bring about unprecedented miracles and leap forward is running high throughout the country, he said, calling upon the whole Party and army and all the people to turn out as one to effect a great surge on all fronts and thus glorify this significant year as a year of victory, a historic year to be recorded in the annals of the country.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, KPA General Hyon Chol Hae and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets to Myanmar SPDC Chairman
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Myanmar SPDC Chairman 
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Than Shwe, chairman of the Myanmar State Peace and Development Council, on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of independence of Myanmar.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger as demanded by and in the interests of the two peoples, Kim in the message wished the chairman and the people of Myanmar greater successes in their work for defending the national sovereignty and achieving the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Myanmar PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Myanmar PM  
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Kim Yong Il Sunday sent a message of greetings to Prime Minister of Myanmar Thein Sein on the occasion of the 62nd independence day of Myanmar.
					 The message wished the Prime Minister greater success in his responsible work for economic development of the country and improvement of the people's standard of living, expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would further develop in politics, economy and various other fields.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Italian FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Italian FM
 Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to his Italian counterpart Franco Frattini on December 28 last year on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Italy.
					 The message said that the DPRK-Italy relations have developed in line with the wishes and interests of the peoples of the two countries for a decade since their establishment.
					
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms on the principles of respect for each other's sovereignty,  noninterference in other's internal affairs, equality and reciprocity, the message wished the Italian foreign minister good health and happiness as well as successes in his responsible work.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed 
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates a signed article to the 18th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party".
					 The work published on January 3, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies the basic reason for the collapse of socialism in some countries and inevitability of victory of socialism. It also expounds the issues of strengthening the driving force of the revolution and enhancing its role and maintaining fundamental principles of socialism in the revolution and construction.
					
					 Noting that the work is one of historic importance as it indicates ways for accomplishing the cause of socialism in the present times and proved on a scientific basis the invincibility of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, the article goes on:
					
					 Since the publication of the work the Korean people have cherished the firm faith that Korean-style socialism will triumph only when they advance under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK resolutely defended socialism and laid a reliable springboard from which to build a great, prosperous and powerful nation overcoming the worst ordeals during the "Arduous March," the forced march. This was the precious fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who has led the socialist cause of Juche along the road of victories only.
					
					 Under his leadership dramatic changes startling all people have taken place in the DPRK last year and there emerged a phenomenal age in which all the ideals of the people come true.
					
					 Now the army and people of the DPRK firmly believe than ever before in the invincible might and rosy future of Korean-style socialism making dynamic progress under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Korean-style socialism represents the invincible bulwark winning one victory after another with strong independent stand, the revolutionary fortress advancing with the might of single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people and the impregnable stronghold emerging ever-victorious with matchless army as main pillar.
					
					 The inviolable dignity and invincible might of Korean-style socialism is just the brilliant fruition of the outstanding idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il. Thanks to his veteran and tested leadership the Korean people are sure to emerge victors in today's struggle to bring about a radical turn in improving the people's standard of living.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised
Pyongyang, January 3 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures, photo exhibitions, book and handicraft exhibitions and film shows were held in South Africa, Ethiopia, Malaysia and Russia between December 21 and 28 last year on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display in the venues were works of Kim Jong Il, photos on his revolutionary activities, books and photos of the Korean people in their struggle for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and handicraft representing the wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "Reply of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation."
